Sinopse: Jasna is a teenage girl living in the poor suburbs in southern Belgrade, Serbia. She likes to record everything around her using a mobile-phone camera. She is making videos of herself, her school friends, her family, and Djole--the boy of her dreams. Her family is a mess: father is terminally ill and mother is barely coping. That's why she spends more and more time hanging out with her school friends, partying, and drinking. At one of the parties, she finally starts a conversation with Djole and later they develop an intense sexual relationship. When he realizes that she will do anything to be close to him, Djole starts using her as a sexual object. Jasna starts to experiment with drugs an skip school. Her life is getting out of control and she needs Djole to accept and reciprocate her affections.—Ime Prezime
